required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pertinence of Pediatric Message Delivered to Parents During Antenatal Consultations
clinical_study.official_title: Pertinence of Pediatric Message Delivered to Parents During Antenatal Consultations

brief_summary.textblock:
Antenatal consultations are experienced as traumatic for many couples. Moreover, when informations are given urgently ; comprehension and psychological impact aren't well evaluate.
This project aims to evaluate comprehension and psychological impact, for both members of the couple, when informations are provided urgently or during usual consultations.

primary_outcome.measure: Comprehension and psychological impact ; urgently informations compared with usual consultations
primary_outcome.time_frame: At pregnancy follow-up visit up to 36 weeks gestation
primary_outcome.description: After non opposition, surveys are given to parents Scale built by investigators. With items about comprehension and psychological impact. From 0 to 23. One point per item. Higher values (23/23) represent a better outcome (comprehension and good psychological impact (0/23 if not)).

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference between both members of the couple
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At pregnancy follow-up visit up to 36 weeks gestation
secondary_outcome.description: Same survey for both members, evaluation and comparison of answers. Same scale

secondary_outcome.measure: Comprehension and psychological impact, at pregnancy's theoric term compared with first survey Same scale
secondary_outcome.description: Same survey, realized at pregnancies' theoric terms

arm_group.description: Survey after pediatric antenatal consultation, for both members of couple if possible

intervention.description: Realization of a pediatric consultation. At the end, evaluation of comprehension and psychological impact with a survey (completed by parents).

study_pop.textblock: All parents with need antenatal pediatric urgently or usual consultation

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Parents whom pregnancies need antenatal pediatric consultation
- Non opposition
Exclusion Criteria:
- < 18 years old
- Psychiatric illness
